'''Kurage's Oath''' is [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|each of the first 6 hits|{{Not a typo|0.67}}}}
** Generate on average 0.67 × 6 = '''{{Not a typo|4.02}}''' elemental particles if all ticks hit an enemy.
* The Bake-Kurage ticks every 2 seconds, for a total of '''7''' times before its 12s duration ends. (including the initial hit)
* Only one Bake-Kurage can exist at a time

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|character=Sangonomiya Kokomi|talent=Kurage's Oath|ascension|1|Tamanooya's Casket}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|The Clouds Like Waves Rippling|Increases the healing that nearby party members under 50% HP receive from the Bake-Kurage.}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|All Streams Flow to the Sea}}
